newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian foreign minister recovering in hospital.
newsitem.headline: Indian foreign minister recovering in hospital.

text.p: Indian Foreign Minister Inder Kumar Gujral was recovering in hospital on Tuesday from a fever which forced him to postpone a visit to Sri Lanka, a ministry spokesman said.
"He is feeling much better and under control," the spokesman said, without elaborating on the nature of the illness.

Gujral was taken to the All India Institute of Medical Sciences on Monday following a sudden illness which forced him to postpone an October 24-27 visit to Colombo to co-chair the third meeting of the Indo-Sri Lanka Joint Commission.
